subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Casey Mears was hired yesterday to drive for Hendrick Motorsports, earning a seat with one of Nascar's superteams. The move had been widely expected since last week, when Mears informed the car owner Chip Ganassi that he would not be returning in 2007 on the same day Brian Vickers asked to be released from his Hendrick contract.
